name: Atomic Handball
overview: In the year 2040 all major sports have been replaced by the exciting Atomic Handball. In this year handball has evolved to the point that, instead of a rubber ball, the game is played with a moon ball that can only be deflected with an electron paddle. Subatomic particles must be destroyed for points. Sport in 2040. Handball atomic and super electronic. Clear the screen! Published in Super VIC & C64 A3-N01 (January 1986) in Italy, published in 64'er Spielesammlung #6, SYS PD Diskett#30 (1992) / 75 Spill Datatronic / part of "Atomic Challenger" & "Arcade Action" game packs.
